Sign language characteristics

For systems that present auditory content, people may need sign language content in a sign language that they understand.

Comment on this item

Notes

Note: This may need to be broken up into more granular needs.

Mappings

Required abilityAccessibility characteristicSupport needed
AuditoryDifficultyDefault

References

  • Reference: 5-2-3-a to have auditory content presented in a sign language a user can understand
